name: flashpaper
tagline: A self-destructing service for sharing encrypted messages securely
description: FlashPaper is a secure self-destructing messaging service built for privacy. It lets users share encrypted notes that expire after reading, with no account required. Ideal for sensitive short-lived communication.

features.title: Temporary Note Sharing
features.description: Share short text notes through time-limited links

features.title: Automatic Expiration
features.description: Remove shared notes after a configured lifetime

features.title: Web-Based Editor
features.description: Write and publish notes using a browser interface

features.title: Read-Once Access
features.description: Limit notes to a single view before deletion

features.title: Minimal Interface
features.description: Use a simple interface focused on text sharing

features.title: No Account Requirement
features.description: Share notes without creating user accounts
